select id, user_id, category_id, article_cover, article_title, `type`, original_url, is_top, is_delete, `status`, create_time, update_time, article_content from tb_article

SELECT a.id, article_cover, article_title, SUBSTR( article_content, 1, 500 ) AS article_content, a.create_time, a.type, a.is_top, a.category_id, category_name, t.id AS tag_id, t.tag_name FROM ( SELECT id, article_cover, article_title, article_content, type, is_top, create_time, category_id FROM tb_article WHERE is_delete = 0 AND status = 1 ORDER BY is_top DESC, id DESC LIMIT #{current} , #{size} ) a JOIN tb_category c ON a.category_id = c.id JOIN tb_article_tag atg ON a.id = atg.article_id JOIN tb_tag t ON t.id = atg.tag_id ORDER BY a.is_top DESC, a.id DESC
